page.shortlink: api objects set object duplicate function
page.description: Create a copy of the set, with all records and layouts.

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The resulting table's path, filename and extension (.dbf).

argument.name: flags
argument.description: Optional. Default = 0. The Flags parameter allows you to control the options to the duplication.

item.description:
Records: No,
Dictionary: No,
Indexes: No

Records: No,
Dictionary: No,
Indexes: Yes

Records: No,
Dictionary: Yes,
Indexes: No

Records: No,
Dictionary: Yes,
Indexes: Yes

Records: Yes,
Dictionary: No,
Indexes: No

Records: Yes,
Dictionary: No,
Indexes: Yes

Records: Yes,
Dictionary: Yes,
Indexes: No

Records: Yes,
Dictionary: Yes,
Indexes: Yes

page.discussion: The SET.DUPLICATE() method creates a copy of the set.
page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = set.open("invoice") ptr.duplicate("invoice2")
